page.title: 11SHOPPING IN SLOUGH
page.content: A. Are you from Slough or outside Slough? 42% Slough 58% Outside B. How often do you shop in the High St? 40% Daily 24% Weekly 6% Fortnightly 6% Monthly 12% six monthly 8% Yearly C. How often do you visit the High St. for entertainment and eating out? 4% Daily 4% Weekly 4% Fortnightly 4% Monthly 8% six monthly 4% yearly D. Do you like the pedestrian area? 78% Yes 22% No E. What changes would you like in the High St.? 1.No busses allowed. 2.More litter baskets. 3.More toilets. 4.A map in a prominent position. 5.More car parking space. 6.More restaurants.
